title: How Men Solved Problems Before Social Media @JWALLER #shorts
description:
Here's a clip from a podcast episode with @JWALLER #shorts 
Full Clip 🔗: https://youtu.be/9Bzb2-vqTCI
———————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men? 

Michael’s Men of Action Mentoring Program is a Master’s course dedicated to helping people elevate their social lives by becoming higher status and building elite social circles.

Click the link to learn how you can start living the high-status social life you always wanted: https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "I'll tell you right now, I don't even have to ask you. I already know the answer to this. You come from a time and I come from a time where you would go to a bar and get in a fight and you'd go back the next week and no one would call the cops. I was a bouncer in Austin, Texas in 1999, bro. We had brawls and the next day you were just cool. Like it was, it doesn't make any difference. From 07 on, I'm not condoning violence. What I'm saying is it was a different experience where if you had a problem with someone, it was an in real life interaction and then it was solved. And you could actually go back and being friends when it's an anonymous interaction. When you start talking about my mom for some reason because I don't agree with you on Ukraine, then all of a sudden now we're never gonna be friends. And now you get into the situation where now the same guy has to confront a beautiful woman, has no idea what he's doing. You combine that with what you said, where you might have a PUA who's like, I am going to manipulate a woman to coming into my mother's basement and having sex with me. Whereas war room and men of action would be, let's get the out of your mother's basement. And you're dead on about that fighting thing. I don't condone violence either. But I'm gonna tell you this, it was nothing to get in a fistfight at a bus stop or saying, okay, bro, I'll see you at recess. There was actually a repercussion for what was gonna happen. And I've been in plenty of fistfights and I've bled, dude. And these guys, they throw these things and these words around.
